guide: Play Pokémon Emerald with trainer ID ending with 2 or 3 (for the Hipster and Aguav Berry). Obtain all possible elements using only that game.
-Guide to catch and train Pokémon recommended for 100% completion (Mudkip, Beldum, Latios, Kecleon, Smeargle)
-Battle Facilities guides/tools: Assistant, RNG manipulation, Documentation
-To beat Trainer Hill, use Smeargle with Dragon Rage. (See Guide)

-Easiest way to get to Mirage Island for Liechi Berry is to obtain a stationnary Kecleon with PID 4513EAD1 (frame 1008), and talk with the old man 44 days after creating a new game. Alternatively, get Kecleon with PID 9A66D3DC (frame 3900) and talk after 2 days.
-Fastest way to rematch regular trainers is to walk 255 steps, then leave/re-enter the trainer's map.

-Fastest way to rematch Gym leaders is to fight 59 wild Pokémon then save. Battle the 60th one and check if you got a rematch. If not, restart the game. The total number of wild Pokémon you battled can be found from the Storyteller in Mauville (Trainer's ID ending in 6 or 7).
Play Pokémon Sapphire with trainer ID ending with 1 or 6 (for Wiki Berry) until defeating the champion for Blue Tent. Use e-Reader to obtain Eon Ticket.
Play Pokémon Emerald JP with trainer ID ending with 2 or 3 (for Hipster) until reaching Mauville. Mix records with Emerald repeatly to get all Hipster words.
Play Pokémon Emerald with trainer ID ending with 2 or 7 reaching Mossdeep Game Corner.
Play Pokémon Ruby JP with trainer ID ending with 4 or 5 (for Trader) until defeating Norman (5th badge). Unlock Mystery Event then trade Regi Dolls and Seedot Doll.
Play Pokémon FireRed until reaching Seven Island (for Unown) and until reaching Mewtwo.
-The hardest item to obtain is Lucky Egg (See Guide.) Alternatively, obtain Lucky Egg from Pokémon XD, which is far faster.
Play Pokémon LeafGreen until unlocking Joyful Game Corner in Two Island.
Play Pokémon Colosseum Bonus Disc US for Jirachi (transferring to your Pokémon Sapphire game).
Play Pokémon Colosseum Bonus Disc US for Jirachi again on a new Pokémon Sapphire game until obtaining both Salac Berry and Ganlon Berry from Jirachi.

Play Pokémon Colosseum JP until purifying all 48 shadow Pokémon. Obtain Celebi from Pokémon Colosseum Bonus Disc JP. Beat Mt Battle Story-Mode for Earth Ribbon. Beat Mt Battle Battle-Mode two times for Ho-Oh and enough Coupons for Apicot Berry and Petaya Berry.
-Mt Battle can be easily beaten using Lv100 Mewtwo with Ice Beam, Thunderbolt, Flamethrower and Calm Mind.
Play Berry Crush, Dodrio Berry Picking and Pokémon Jump using both Emerald US games, Emerald JP, FireRed and LeafGreen.
Play Pokémon XD until Citadark Isle for Lugia and Sacred Ash.
Obtain all event-exclusive elements.
Check Generation III Version Compability Page

missables.text: Your Trainer ID modulo 6 must be 0 or 1, and the randomly generated reward for the Quiz Lady must be Watmel Berry or Durin Berry (1/8 chance). You must choose Latios or Latias depending on the rewarded berry from Quiz Lady. Note that the trainer ID must also end with 2 or 3 to get an exclusive trendy word.

Your Trainer ID must end with 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 or 8 in order to get an exclusive berry from Route 120 Beauty. (The berry given with ID 0, 4, 5 or 9 can be obtained elsewhere.) Note that it must end with 2 or 3 to get an exclusive trendy word.
To own both Storage Key and TM13 - Ice Beam, you must not use Storage Key and get TM 13 - Ice Beam from Mauville Game Corner.
To own both Root Fossil and Lileep, you must not use Root Fossil and get Lileep from trade.
To own both Claw Fossil and Anorith, you must not use Claw Fossil and get Anorith from trade.
To own both Meteorite and TM27 - Return, you must not give Meteorite to Professor Cozmo, and get TM27 - Return from Pacifidlog.
Glitter Mail, Bead Mail, Tropic Mail from the Trick House are missable.
